page.title: 111,2,3,BLOCK HOME
page.content: 1,2,3,BLOCK HOME you need 4 or more people.Someone is it and the rest go and hide.When the person who is it has counted to a special number he or she goes to look for the people who are hiding.The people who are hiding have to get back to where they first started without being seen.When they get back to where they started without being seen they say 1,2,3,BLOCK HOME . If there are some people who have been caught you can say 1,2,3, BLOCK HOME save all prisoners, which means they are all not caught.If you are seen running to where you started from by the person who is it you have to race the person who is it to where you started from.If you are caught by the person who is it he, or she has to say 1,2,3,BLOCK HOME, after HOME they have to say your name If you are the first person caught and someone doesn't save
